title: Wild Card Shaco
body:
Thank so much for the shaco skin, I don't recall a new shaco skin since I joined when aatrox was released, so little over a year. I'm happy to see it and I think it's great for a 750 skin. I have a few questions regarding the skin however
1. Is that what Shaco's face it like with out the mask or is this strictly a reimagining of our jester?
2. I noticed that although the shiv is red when he uses 2 shiv poison it is still white, I know you had a similar thing with nautilus' anchor, but surely a single colour change from white to red wouldn't be enough to warrant the skin be upped to 975 right?
3.  Is his hair inspired from that villain from 101 dalmations? Cause that's what it reminds me of
Anyways thankyou again for the great Shaco skin, with this soul reaper vlad and marauder ww you made a new skin for all my mains
TY

replies.body:
Heya! 

> 2. I noticed that although the shiv is red when he uses 2 shiv poison it is still white, I know you had a similar thing with nautilus' anchor, but surely a single colour change from white to red wouldn't be enough to warrant the skin be upped to 975 right?

It's a model change that just hasn't been completed yet. You're absolutely right, this wouldn't warrant the skin being bumped up to 975 RP. It's a quality of life change, similar to Naut's anchor, as you've mentioned. :]
Glad to know, No comment for the other questions eh?

Sorry, not ignoring you on these, was just asking the artists to get the proper information! 

His face is painted in this particular skin, as opposed to a mask, and his hair wasn't inspired by Cruelle Deville. ^-^
Ty very much katey you work hard and have already integrated yourself deeply within the community despite being relatively new.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=A3YLbdJE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-30T18:30:05.359+0000)
>
> Heya! 
> 
> It's a model change that just hasn't been completed yet. You're absolutely right, this wouldn't warrant the skin being bumped up to 975 RP. It's a quality of life change, similar to Naut's anchor, as you've mentioned. :]

So why isn't this the case with Marauder Ashe then? The frost doesn't go with that skin at all.
Hi i really want to buy a wild card skin... but its not available now.... when it will release again?

Dunno why but this skin reminds me of two things (how I imagined them):
http://wot.wikia.com/wiki/Mordeth
http://wot.wikia.com/wiki/Ruby-hilted_dagger
